Articles.Content: I think that KSP should add Airplanes. This way you could make it so that there is a mode for an 'Evolution of the Space Race.' Like you start off with a Kerbal looking at a bird and then you first design an airplane, and then you can make spacecraft AND planes. The point is that KSP should add airplanes
.15 already added the parts to make them.

Indeed they did.

maybe they dont have ALOT of spaceplane parts, but they should add more soon.
I think the OP is trying to say the advent of flight be implemented in the game. I disagree strongly as there are other games to do that sort of thing as the name of the game says it all.

I\'m all for primitive flight technology being supported for mods but i think that the campaign should start focusing on pre WWII level rocketry and the space centre should only start developing aircraft when the rockets have become advanced enough that it is applicable.

Let it be known that planes are indeed possible (and fun!)
